verses.roman:
ananta vaikuṇṭha eka eka deśe yāra
sei paravyoma-dhāmera ke karu vistāra

synonyms: ananta vaikuṇṭha—unlimited Vaikuṇṭha planets; eka eka—certain; deśe—in a place; yāra—of which; sei—that; para-vyoma—of the spiritual sky; dhāmera—of the abode; ke karu vistāra—who can understand the breadth.
translation: "Since all the Vaikuṇṭha planets are located in a certain corner of the spiritual sky, who can measure the spiritual sky?
